misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a formidable presence from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his aggressive play style and colorful language on the course, Simo has secured three Hector Trophée victories, marking him as a serious contender in every tournament he enters.

While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Simo's consistent performance and strategic approach make him a threat to any opponent. His relentless drive for improvement is evident in his recent equipment change, as he has adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season, hoping to fine-tune his game and capture both the team and individual titles.

Simo's passion for golf is undeniable, and he approaches each tournament with a fierce determination. Whether he is delighting fans with an excellent play or expressing his frustration at a missed opportunity, Simo's authenticity and commitment to the sport make him a captivating figure to watch.
